info.name: WhatsApp Dark Grey Orange mod by USZ
info.description: Please enjoy my dark'n eye friendly WhatsApp theme! :)
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog: 

2017/09/28 Input sending Text-Color chanched to DarkOrange;
                   Context-Menu lightning Grey;

                   Contact Big Picture Vies DarkGrey background
